pages.text: Cousins to Witches, Warlocks are hostile creatures that attack by summoning Wartlings upon their foes. If their target goes near them, they will throw a bunch of Snap Fungi in the air where they might hit said target.
They're resistant to Explosions and Fire.
If a Villager is underneath a Crying Obsidian Block, they have a chance of transforming into a Warlock.
